name: KL00128E_'PHAGS PA CHOS NYID RANG GI NGO BO STONG PA NYID LAS MI G-YO BAR THA DAD PAR THAMS CAD LA SNANG BA'I MDO_+.txt
download_path: /kangyur updated to 11 15 23 ws/10. mdo mang_collection of sutras (sūtra)$$/vol 9 (ta)/kl00128e_'phags pa chos nyid rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid las mi g-yo bar tha dad par thams cad la snang ba'i mdo_+.txt
meta_text: ('An Exalted Sutra entitled “How All the Different Things in the World Appear Separately, without Diverging from their Essential Nature, which is that They are Empty of Having any Quality of Their Own” (Ārya Dharmatā Svabhāva Śūnyatā Acala Prati Sarva Aloka Sūtra)', 'text')
title_tib: 'PHAGS PA CHOS NYID RANG GI NGO BO STONG PA NYID LAS MI G-YO BAR THA DAD PAR THAMS CAD LA SNANG BA'I MDO
title_eng: ('An Exalted Sutra entitled “How All the Different Things in the World Appear Separately, without Diverging from their Essential Nature, which is that They are Empty of Having any Quality of Their Own” (Ārya Dharmatā Svabhāva Śūnyatā Acala Prati Sarva Aloka Sūtra)', 'text')
